categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: Bayora was a location in the galaxy where, at some point in time, Lor San Tekka took a map that led to Luke Skywalker. While probing the mind of Del Meeko, Kylo Ren learned that Tekka had taken the map to Bayora.
Bayora was first mentioned in the 2017 video game, Star Wars Battlefront II as part of the single player campaign. It later was mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
